document.full_text: president barack obama said on tuesday that he cannot reform u.s. immigration laws alone and pressure must be brought to bear on congress to fix what he called a "broken" system.
document.title: obama urges pressure on congress to act on immigration
lines_and_colors: president barack obama said on tuesday that he cannot reform u.s. immigration laws alone and pressure must be brought to bear on congress to fix what he called a "broken" system.
